meanings.sent1: Her drawing was imprecise, with wobbly lines and uneven shapes.
meanings.sent2: The imprecise measurements led to the construction error.
meanings.sent3: The imprecise map made the treasure hunt more challenging.
meanings.sent4: His memory was like an imprecise clock, sometimes fast, sometimes slow.
meanings.sent5: The imprecise instructions left everyone confused and lost.

meanings.sent1: The imprecise directions caused us to take the wrong turn.
meanings.sent2: The imprecise speech left the audience puzzled.
meanings.sent3: The imprecise recipe resulted in a cake that tasted like soap.
meanings.sent4: His mind was an imprecise mirror, reflecting distorted images.
meanings.sent5: The imprecise weather forecast made planning the picnic difficult.
